content: I'm bald, knees bad, back hurts, butt, chin, and chest is sagging. Older folks told this would happen, when I was a young wippersnapper but I didn't believe them.
reply: I'm bald, knees bad, back hurts, butt, chin, and chest is sagging. Older folks told this would happen, when I was a young wippersnapper but I didn't believe them.
title: They Told Me  These Would Happen, but I didn't Believe Them

content: I was so much older then I'm younger than that now - - Wandering and Wondering
reply: I was so much older then I'm younger than that now - - Wandering and Wondering
title: They Told Me  These Would Happen, but I didn't Believe Them

content: I HEAR THAT........ Weighed myself the other day.... and I was heavier than I had EVER been before.... I'm not that bad... about 25 - 30 pounds too heavy, but it is KILLING me. Flying a desk for a living is taking it's toll. It did motivate me to cut out all my snacks, (and I love to snack) and start walking / running again. I'm gonna get back down to 190 again if it KILLS me. I'm 6'2", and that is a good weight for me. The BMI charts say 175-180... don't think that's gonna happen.... "The things that will destroy America are prosperity at any price, peace at any price, safety first instead of duty first, the love of soft living and the get rich quick theory of life." ~~~Theodore Roosevelt~~~
reply: I HEAR THAT........ Weighed myself the other day.... and I was heavier than I had EVER been before.... I'm not that bad... about 25 - 30 pounds too heavy, but it is KILLING me. content: Wow, do I know the feeling. Thing is I haven't gained weight. Still 6'4" 200 lbs can still wear my BDU's. Problem is things have shifted drasticly. Not to mention I have less hair and more grey that my 73 year old father. What's up with that. Beard is as white as BVD's. I just say I've earned every grey hair. Don't do any of that comb over crap still keep regulation. And if they don't like it. TFB.
reply: Wow, do I know the feeling. Thing is I haven't gained weight. Still 6'4" 200 lbs can still wear my BDU's. Problem is things have shifted drasticly. content: Yea, it seems to happen to most of us. I looked into the mirror and there was an old man looking back at me. There I was playing Army for many years and then I suddenly I realized that I wasn't young any more. I had a heart attack and a stroke and my hair turned grey almost overnight. And then I had two little kids calling me grandpa. Where did all the good times go?
reply: Yea, it seems to happen to most of us. I looked into the mirror and there was an old man looking back at me. There I was playing Army for many years and then I suddenly I realized that I wasn't young any more. I had a heart attack and a stroke and my hair turned grey almost overnight. And then I had two little kids calling me grandpa. Where did all the good times go?
title: They Told Me  These Would Happen, but I didn't Believe Them

content: I was an Army Ranger for 27 years falling apart to bro broken back both knees replaced. Hurts like hell getting out of bed everyu time.lotta meds.But it was all worth it.GOD BLESS ALL OUR TROOPS in the sand pit and every where else.RLTW 3rd 75th SgtM.M.Vest
reply: I was an Army Ranger for 27 years falling apart to bro broken back both knees replaced. Hurts like hell getting out of bed everyu time.lotta meds.But it was all worth it.GOD BLESS ALL OUR TROOPS in the sand pit and every where else.RLTW 3rd 75th SgtM.M.Vest
title: They Told Me  These Would Happen, but I didn't Believe Them

content: Only 45 here but feel like 70. Legs and feet crushed from Black Hawk wheel five years ago. Hernitated disc (Lumbar 5) torn testicle....now that's a whole lot of fun! All my hair is there and there's hardly any grey still. It's funny, I still can't grow a full beard, it comes in patchy. Meds, meds, meds for legs, acid reflux, etc. But hey, just hanging out with my two sons (21, USMC, Cpl and a 14 yr old) keeps me feeling younger. Oh ya, I just had to get reading glasses. Don
reply: Only 45 here but feel like 70. Legs and feet crushed from Black Hawk wheel five years ago. Hernitated disc (Lumbar 5) torn testicle....now that's a whole lot of fun! All my hair is there and there's hardly any grey still. It's funny, I still can't grow a full beard, it comes in patchy. Meds, meds, meds for legs, acid reflux, etc. But hey, just hanging out with my two sons (21, USMC, Cpl and a 14 yr old) keeps me feeling younger. Oh ya, I just had to get reading glasses. Don

content: Up until a few years ago, I wore the same Levi 501 jeans that I wore in high school (class of '85)- 29in waist, 34in length. Now; for no apparent reason, I'm a 31 waist, 34 length. Eat the same as I always did, just as lazy, just thicker. Oh well....I guess I'm not 18 any more.....THANK GOD!!!!! Duane A. Brinson Lahaina, Hi. U.S.M.C. 1985-1989
